description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Version 1.2 Updates: Price reduced to $1! Flashlight "reload" takes 50% longer. Enemies are more likely to wait and kill you from the doorway versus standing next to you in the room.
